author: Special Correspondent
text:
Naam Tamilar Katchi founder Seeman was arrested here on Tuesday when he attempted to proceed towards Palamedu to conduct jallikattu defying the Supreme Court ban.

Veera Tamilar Front, a youth wing floated by Mr. Seeman, had pasted posters in the city giving a call for conducting the banned sport here.

The district police intercepted his vehicle while he was on his way to Palamedu and arrested him and 120 others. The police took them to Sholavandan. He was later released.
title: Seeman arrested
